downloadTitle: Security Update for Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 Service Pack 1 TFS Web Access (KB2719584)
downloadDescription: This update addresses cross site scripting vulnerabilities and cross site request forgery vulnerabilities in TFS Web Access
detailsSection: This update addresses cross site scripting vulnerabilities and cross site request forgery vulnerabilities in TFS Web Access.  It only impacts TFS 2010 since Web Access was not included in previous versions.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Architectures:
  • 32-Bit (x86)
  • 64-Bit (x64)
Hardware Requirements:
  • Computer that has a 2.2GHz or faster processor
  • 1 GB RAM for x86
  • 8 GB of available hard disk space
Prerequisites:
  • Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2010 SP1
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
